black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Princess Kensli) standing outside a large wooden door labeled "PRINT SHOP", looking hesitant and peeking around the doorframe, wearing a crown and simple adventure dress.
black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The King looking worried, talking to (Kensli), who looks determined and holds up a sparkling, rainbow-colored ruler.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, The inside of a print shop with big, complicated machines with gears and rollers looming over tiny (Kensli), steam coming out of one machine, (Kensli) walking forward holding a rainbow ruler.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A round, messy monster made of dripping ink blobs with a goofy, naughty grin making splashes on the floor, (Kensli) pointing her ruler at it.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A skinny, jagged goblin made of crumpled paper and tape, holding a stack of shiny books (the Proofs) in its crinkly claws, (Kensli) looking angry and brave.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Kensli) using her ruler to straighten a piece of paper, the Ink-Blob and Paper-Jam monsters looking sad and defeated, shrinking away into a dark corner.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, (Kensli) hugging a large stack of glowing, perfect books with a big smile, the machines in the background looking quiet now.

black and white coloring book page, clean line art, no shading, white background, A triumphant scene with (Kensli) holding the books high in the air, the King clapping, and cute castle animals cheering around her, the sun shining brightly.
